channel.title: Umashi Learn Russian on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Umashi Learn Russian on Rusland 1

item.title: ш and щ: Spot the Differences
item.description: Sound For what descriptions of sounds are worth: Wikipedia compares ш to ‘sh in shop’ and ‘ch in machine,’ but when it comes to щ, it hits a dead end: ‘Dutch has no words with this sound.’ The English Wikipedia entry for shcha/щ isn’t much help either: ‘it represents the voiceless alveolo-palatal fricative /ɕ(ː)/.
